name: I Got Your Back
title: Noelle: I Got Your Back
desc: A stout heart is the sternest armor.
inPlayDescription: After <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Noelle uses a Normal Attack: If this card and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Full Plate are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Noelle to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Noelle, equip this card.After Noelle equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Breastplate once.After <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Noelle uses a Normal Attack: If this card and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Full Plate are both still in play, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)(You must have Noelle in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
